case.title: 52yrs old white italian seeks nice women - 52 (new york)
case.text: hi im 52yrs old,what i am seeking is a LTR with a good,nice female.looks arent as important as what your feet look like,i love pretty feet,nail polish on toes and high arches in your feet,as for me,i am nice guy,good sense humor,funny romantic,5ft 9in,207ilbs,stocky,shave my head bald.like movies dining in,and out,i want to meet a girl. ages 35 to 52yrs old,if your interested,send pic of your face and feet,lets meet.no pic no reply,pic for pic
